name: Idorecall.GitHub.io
body: # Welcome to iDoRecall [iDoRecall](https://iDoRecall.com) is a cross-platform app that helps users memorize anything they want to learn with a minimum of effort, by seamlessly prompting them to recall information at the right time. We use proven research and methodologies, such as spaced repetition, or the testing effect. ## Open source contributions We believe in the values of open source and are proud to contribute the following: * [selection-menu](http://idorecall.github.io/selection-menu/) - JavaScript context menu on selection
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
